buildCommand: rm -rf tmp-spec-repo && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/agentcommunity/AgentInterfaceDiscovery tmp-spec-repo && mv tmp-spec-repo/docs/aid docs/aid && python3 -m mkdocs build && mkdir -p site/schema/v1 && cp tmp-spec-repo/packages/aid-schema/aid.schema.json site/schema/v1/aid.schema.json
